pr_title: Remove build steps not required for report generation

timeline.message: Remove build steps not required for report generation
Skip revapi in Run Tests task

timeline.bodyText: Should jacoco.skip=true be added here as well?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -28,10 +28,10 @@ jobs:
         goals: 'install'
 
     - task: Maven@3
-      displayName: 'Install Module and Run SpotBugs, Checkstyle, RevApi, and Javadoc'
+      displayName: 'Install Module'
       inputs:
         mavenPomFile: sdk/core/pom.service.xml
-        options: '--no-transfer-progress -DskipTests -Dgpg.skip -Dverify-readme'
+        options: '--no-transfer-progress -DskipTests -Dgpg.skip -Dcheckstyle.skip=true -Dspotbugs.skip=true -Dmaven.javadoc.skip=true -Drevapi.skip=true'

replies.bodyText: If tests are skipped, jacoco will be a no-op anyway.
replies.author: srnagar

timeline.bodyText: Should jacoco be skipped here as well?
timeline.author: alzimmermsft
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,7 +2,7 @@ parameters:
   SDKType: client
   ServiceDirectory: not-specified # Set a default that breaks in obvious ways.
   PreTestSteps: []
-  TestOptions: '$(DefaultOptions) -Dmaven.javadoc.skip=true -Dspotbugs.skip=true -Dcheckstyle.skip=true'
+  TestOptions: '$(DefaultOptions) -Dmaven.javadoc.skip=true -Dspotbugs.skip=true -Dcheckstyle.skip=true -Drevapi.skip=true'

replies.bodyText: We need the jacoco report generated here because we want to fail the build if coverage drops below the threshold.
replies.author: srnagar
